PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryStandardFixingPlate
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties specific to standard fixing plates.

PropertyDef.Name: StandardFixingPlateWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The width of the standard fixing plate.

PropertyDef.Name: StandardFixingPlateDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: The depth of the standard fixing plate.

PropertyDef.Name: StandardFixingPlateThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the standard fixing plate.
